attributes.action: 0% tax rate for emergency and essential workers during the Coronavirus crisis.
attributes.additional_details: The government has gone to exceptional lengths to support most workers and businesses through this unprecedented event. Let us ask the government to go just a little further and put in place a temporary zero percent tax rate - to not only support essential and key workers but to also show the country’s thanks to those who will be supporting the rest of us during this time?
attributes.background: Emergency staff, workers in the NHS, social care, utilities, teachers, food retail and production plus many others will continue to work throughout the Coronavirus outbreak to keep all of us safe, connected and fed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
